About the Company: Bhilwara Spinners Ltd is into the manufacturing of synthetic blended yarn in raw white. The range of the yarn includes, Polyester, Viscose, Acrylic, Polyester/Viscose blended, Polyester/Acrylic blended, Polyester/Viscose blended, Polyester/Linen blended,Viscose/Linen blended, High Twist / Super High Twist, Slub/ Spun yarn, Blended with Texturised, Special Application yarns for Carpet, Sewing Thread, Flame and Temperature Resistance yarn like Aramide, Modacrylic, Homo Acrylic and Poly Sulphide yarn (PPA).They are also manufacturing products suitable for other uses like upholstery, tapestry, and industrial fabrics.The company is one of the biggest Export House of all kinds of Synthetic Ring Spun Yarns.
